StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateMediaInfoUsingGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MediaInfoID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int, @MediaTypeID smallint, @MediaName varchar(100), @PointOfContactID uniqueiden..er, @Organiza.onID int, @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @SchoolCodeint int
BEGIN TRANSACTION
Select @SchoolCodeint = School_Code FROM High_School hs where hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].[CollegePro.le] where CollegePro.leID = @CollegePro.leID and @CollegePro.leID IS NOT NULL) BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] ([CollegePro.leID],[SCHOOL_CODE], [FiscalYear], [UserLogin], [UpdateDate]) VALUES (@CollegePro.leID,@SchoolCodeint,@FiscalYear, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].MediaInfo WHERE MediaInfoID= @MediaInfoID)
BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[MediaInfo]
SET [TypeID]= @MediaTypeID, [Descripton]= @MediaName, [CollegePro.leID] = @CollegePro.leID, [PointOfContactID]= @PointOfContactID, [UserLogin]= @UserLogin, [UpdateDate]= GetDate()
WHERE MediaInfoID= @MediaInfoID END ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[MediaInfo] ([MediaInfoID] ,[TypeID],[Name],[Descripton], [CollegePro.leID], [PointOfContactID], [Organiza.onID], [UserLogin],[UpdateDate] ) VALUES (@MediaInfoID, @MediaTypeID,'', @MediaName, @CollegePro.leID, @PointOfContactID, Null, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
